rules_text:
When this creature enters, create an implant token with a menace counter. [i](It’s a token artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put its counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery”)[/i]
Exile this card from your graveyard: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
